features: EXPRESS DETANGLING AND REPAIR SPRAY | This hair spray is both a restorative treatment and a leave-in detangler that instantly brings strength and shine to the hair and immediately makes styling easier.
THE BENEFITS OF SPRAY | Thanks to its formula enriched with argan, silk proteins and keratin, this spray fills damaged areas of the hair fiber, restructures it and limits frizz and split ends.

THE VIRTUES OF ARGAN | Argan oil is rich in nourishing fatty acids and tocopherol with natural anti-inflammatory effects. It repairs and revitalizes the hair, preserves its hydration level and makes it silky.
USER TIPS | Spray the product on damp hair by applying one or two pressures on your Arganicare spray. This is designed as a leave-in treatment, so there is no need to rinse after application.

THE ARGANICARE BRAND | Arganicare has developed a vast range of high-end beauty products (hair care, serums, masks, skin care) based on argan oil and other effective active ingredients with recognized actions.
description: Product Description Arganicare Express Hair Repair Conditioner provides elasticity to brittle hair that is lacking shine. After the first application, you will see an immediate effect on your hair which will be shinier and easier to comb. The unique formula contains argan oil with silk proteins, to smooth the hair surface, instantly add shine and to restore hair structure by filling damaged areas with liquid keratins. A uniquely formulated line to hydrate your hair, deeply nourish and revitalize while protecting it from damaging environmental factors. Enriched with certified organic Argan Oil for supreme nourishment and protection & Shea Butter for added moisture. Provides instant repair for hair structure  Smoothens the hair, filling damaged area with peptides Deeply hydrates & nourishes the hair Adds elasticity, shine & controls frizz for easier comb Directions for use: Shake well before use. Use after shampooing. Do not rinse. Spray on wet or towel-dried hair. Arganicare Argan Oil + Shea Butter Shampoo Arganicare Restoring Shampoo, increases softness and manageability as it cleanses. Enriched with Argan Oil, this hair shampoo infuses your hair with nutrients to leave it full, healthy and lustrous. Arganicare Argan Oil + Shea Butter Leave-in Conditioner Arganicare Leave-In Hair Conditioner for Colored and Enhanced Hair is enriched with Argan oil and essential elements that restores hair vitality and enhances the beauty of recently colored and highlighted hair. Prevent fading, protects after exposure to ultraviolet light, pollution and frequent use of hair dryers. Arganicare Argan Oil Hair Masque for Dry & Damaged Hair Arganicare curls define Hair Mask for curly hair contains Argan oil and silk proteins. Contains a nutrient complex that assists the body and makes it stronger. Contains essential vitamins and almond oil which immediately moisturize and strengthen. Arganicare Argan Oil Hair Masque for Colored & Highlighted Hair Arganicare Restructuring Hair Mask for colored hair contains Argan oil and silk proteins. Restores hair vitality and enhances the beauty of recently colored or highlighted hair. Arganicare Argan Oil + Shea Butter Shampoo Arganicare Argan Oil + Shea Butter Leave-in Conditioner Arganicare Argan Oil Hair Masque for Dry & Damaged Hair Arganicare Argan Oil Hair Masque for Colored and Highlighted Hair
